title: RBI MPC Meeting 2025: Date, time and where to watch RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra live
description:
A security official walks past an emblem of the Reserve Bank of India at the central bank's headquarters in Mumbai. (PTI file photo)

The all-new Monetary Policy Committee under new RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra is set to hold key deliberations from February 4. All eyes will be on the February 7 anno...
